events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a full refund since I no longer want the product.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to customer's request for a refund on a wrong item received.
Support agent assigned to handle the refund request and communicate with the customer about next steps.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. Let’s get this resolved for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can verify and process your refund?
Here are the photos of the wrong item I got along with my order ID 123456. Please expedite the refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund within 3 business days and send you confirmation once completed.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your assistance in resolving this matter promptly.
We have processed your refund successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund and that everything is now in order. Please let us know if you need further help.
Since your refund has been successfully received and no further issues reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you!
